thread.title: vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launching in India on January 23rd
thread.title_full: vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launching in India on January 23rd

title: vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launching in India on January 23rd
text:
vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launching in India on January... vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launching in India on January 23rd By January 2, 2017 “The V5 Plus is expected to come with 20MP + 8MP dual front cameras” 
As expected, vivo India has sent out invites for the launch of the V5 Plus, scheduled to take place on January 23rd. The invite says, “ Block your date for the biggest selfie camera revolution ” below what appears to be two camera lenses. 
This surely hints towards the rumoured dual selfie camera the device is expected to come with. Other speculated specifications of the device include a 5.5-inch full HD display, a Snapdragon 652 SoC, 4GB of RAM, 32GB of storage and a 3,300mAh battery with support for fast charging. The main highlight of the device is expected to be its dual front cameras, that are expected to utilise 20MP and 8MP sensors. 
The V5 Plus is the elder sibling of the selfie-centric vivo V5 ( review ) which was released in India back in November. Stay tuned to 91mobiles to know more about the device once it becomes official. Facebook Comments
